item.description:
@Virgin wrote:

This is as much as I know how to do:

case 3789: if(i == 11338) { itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wield"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[0]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[0]; itemDef.modelRotationY; = 588;//zoom and rotation itemDef.modelRotationX; = 1985;//zoom and rotation itemDef.modelZoom; = 2290; itemDef.modelOffset1; = 4; itemDef.modelOffset2; = 2; class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt165 = 13716;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 13716;//female wearing itemDef.modelid; = 13716;//drop and inv class8.anInt175 = 13872; class8.anInt164 = 13344; class8.anInt188 = 13335; itemDef.name = "Energy Sword"; itemDef.description = "The Halo Energy Sword."; }
someone help?
